# Techmiya EdTech

> Best IT Training Institute in Jayanagar, Bangalore

## About

Techmiya EdTech is a premier IT training institute located in Jayanagar, Bangalore, Karnataka, India. We offer comprehensive courses in cutting-edge technologies including Generative AI, Machine Learning, Data Science, Python, AWS, DevOps, Cloud Computing, Full Stack Development, Hardware & Networking.

## Our Courses

### Generative AI & LLM
Comprehensive training in Generative AI, Large Language Models, ChatGPT, and AI applications.

### Machine Learning & Deep Learning
In-depth Machine Learning and Deep Learning courses with hands-on projects using TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn.

### Data Science & Analytics
Complete Data Science training including Python, SQL, Big Data technologies, and visualization tools.

### Cloud Computing & DevOps
AWS, Azure, GCP certification training and DevOps practices including Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD.

### Full Stack Development
Web and software development training with modern frameworks including React, Node.js, Python, and Java.

### Hardware & Networking
Computer hardware, networking, and cybersecurity courses for IT infrastructure professionals.
